name: p5.js Accessible Canvas
description: Canvas に記述的な代替テキストを付与する基本テンプレート。

files.template: let d=0; function setup(){ createCanvas(400,200); noStroke(); describe('A blue circle moves left to right across a light background.'); } function draw(){ background(245); fill('#0984e3'); const x = (frameCount%200)*2; circle(x, height/2, 60); if(frameCount%30===0){ const msg = 'Blue circle at x '+x; const live = document.getElementById('live'); if(live) live.textContent = msg; } }
